name: Electrical LE/Lead Electrical Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Participate in reviews and formulation of technical solutions for the Client in part of Electrical design
  • Provide inputs to the Design Basis, Scope of Work, Initial Data, Kick-off Meeting
  • Assist clients towards feasible options and manage expectations
  • EPFCM, EPC Pre-contract activities, ITB, preparing estimates and price comparisons (PDP, FEED, PD, Detail engineering Subcontractors)
  • Formulate, check-up and analyze capital expenditures and project designs
  • Schedule and coordinate Electrical discipline work to deadlines and within financial budgets
  • Prepare project timely reporting to project management: follow-up the activity, critical deviations of activities and/or potential risks
  • Contribute to get Client’s approval of technical documents
  • Check and monitor Issue quality within the project
  • Develop and review low, medium and high voltage electrical systems for industrial facilities
  • Develop and review single line diagrams, cable schedules, layouts, cable tray plans and other Electrical deliverables as per project scope
  • Perform and check Electrical calculations, including cable sizing, heat trace, lighting, lightning protection, earthing, etc.
  • Review and provide technical evaluation of vendor's and sub-contractor’s proposals for materials, equipment and services
  • Coordinate and develop 3D Models for Electrical scope
  • Participate in 3D model, Constructability, Operability reviews

Требования:

  • Master Degree in Electrical Engineering
  • At least 5 years experience in Oil&Gas Industry or Power Industry
  • Experience in design of low, medium and high voltage electrical systems for industrial facilities
  • Experience in development of Single Line diagrams, Wiring diagrams, Cable layouts/plans
  • Experience in work with material vendors/suppliers
  • Knowledge of International Electrical Codes (IEC) and Russian Regulations
  • Knowledge of AutoCAD, ETAP, AVEVA E3D
  • Good English speaking skills (Upper-Intermediate)
Условия:
  • Оформление по ТК РФ
  • Белая заработная плата
